about_the_game:
The Deluxe Edition soundtrack to the Total War game The Three Kingdoms presents an extended collection of 47 tracks of beautifully crafted and recorded
music, depicting the epic conflict and events following the collapse of the Han Dynasty 220-280 AD China. Blending the delicate and evocative sounds of the Xiao and Bawu, lyrical tones of the Erhu, violin and Cello, and supported by a live orchestra, the music transports you on a journey to the time of great dynasties.
